brianne_byndraeth.name: Brianne Byndraeth
brianne_byndraeth.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Arcana Quest and each Skullduggery Quest you completed.
brianne_byndraeth.details: Focus on purple Wizards and black Rogues to complete these quest types.

caladorn_cassalanter.name: Caladorn Cassalanter
caladorn_cassalanter.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Piety Quest and each Skullduggery Quest you completed.
caladorn_cassalanter.details: Focus on white Clerics and black Rogues to complete these quest types.

durnan_the_wanderer.name: Durnan the Wanderer
durnan_the_wanderer.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Commerce Quest and each Warfare Quest you completed.
durnan_the_wanderer.details: Focus on gold and orange Fighters. Commerce quests often need gold.

khelben_arunsun.name: Khelben Arunsun
khelben_arunsun.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Arcana Quest and each Warfare Quest you completed.
khelben_arunsun.details: Focus on purple Wizards and orange Fighters to complete these quest types.

kyriani_agrivar.name: Kyriani Agrivar
kyriani_agrivar.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Arcana Quest and each Piety Quest you completed.
kyriani_agrivar.details: Focus on purple Wizards and white Clerics to complete these quest types.

larissa_neathal.name: Larissa Neathal
larissa_neathal.body: Score 6 bonus VP for each Building you control.
larissa_neathal.details: Focus on purchasing Buildings from Builder's Hall. Each Building also earns you bonuses when others use it.
larissa_neathal.extra: Strategy: Buy buildings early and often

mirt_the_moneylender.name: Mirt the Moneylender
mirt_the_moneylender.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Commerce Quest and each Piety Quest you completed.
mirt_the_moneylender.details: Focus on gold and white Clerics to complete these quest types.

nindil_jalbuck.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Piety Quest and each Warfare Quest you completed.
nindil_jalbuck.details: Focus on white Clerics and orange Fighters to complete these quest types.

nymara_scheiron.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Commerce Quest and each Skullduggery Quest you completed.
nymara_scheiron.details: Focus on gold and black Rogues to complete these quest types.

piergeiron_the_paladinson.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Piety Quest and each Warfare Quest you completed.
piergeiron_the_paladinson.details: Focus on white Clerics and orange Fighters to complete these quest types.

sammereza_sulphontis.name: Sammereza Sulphontis
sammereza_sulphontis.body: Score 4 bonus VP for each Arcana Quest and each Commerce Quest you completed.
sammereza_sulphontis.details: Focus on purple Wizards and gold to complete these quest types.
